title: Tell me about a memorable concert or music event you attended.

korean: 작년에 친구랑 같이 콘서트 간 적이 있는데, 진짜 잊을 수 없는 경험이었어.
티켓 예매할 때 엄청 긴장했는데, 다행히 좋은 자리 구했어.
공연 시작 전에 굿즈도 사고 주변 구경도 했어.
콘서트장 분위기가 정말 좋았고, 사람들 에너지가 느껴졌어.
가수가 무대에 나왔을 때 환호성이 정말 대단했어.
특히 내가 좋아하는 곡을 부를 때는 소름이 돋았어.
중간에 가수가 관객들이랑 소통하는 시간도 있어서 재미있었어.
앵콜 무대에서는 다같이 떼창하는 게 진짜 짜릿했어.
공연 끝나고 나서도 여운이 한동안 남더라고.
집에 가는 길에 친구랑 계속 공연 얘기하면서 갔어.
다음에도 기회가 되면 또 가고 싶어.
english: Last year I went to a concert with a friend, and, like, it was truly an unforgettable experience.
When I was booking tickets, I was super nervous, but luckily I got good seats.
Before the show started, I bought some merchandise and, you know, looked around.
The atmosphere at the concert venue was really great, and I could feel the energy of the people.
When the singer came on stage, the, like, cheers were really amazing.
Listening to the songs live was, you know, much more touching.
Especially when they performed my favorite song, I got, like, goosebumps.
In the middle, there was also time for the singer to interact with the audience, which was fun.
During the encore, everyone singing together was, like, really thrilling.
Even after the show ended, the feeling lingered for a while.
On the way home, my friend and I kept, you know, talking about the performance.
If I get the chance next time, I want to go again.
